teamMembers.name: Erica Hartman
teamMembers.bio: Erica is a certified teacher with 5 years of experience in childhood development

teamMembers.name: Ethan Hartman
teamMembers.bio: Ethan is pursuing a Bachelors of Science in Computer Science at UAT

mission: Our mission is to nurture the emotional, physical, and intellectual growth of children.
vision: We envision a world where every child has the opportunity to explore, learn, and grow to the maximum extent possible.
ourStory: WonderTales was born out of a desire to create a platform where children could engage in meaningful and joyful learning experiences. Our journey began in 2023, and we have been committed to this mission ever since.
